amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1455, in lieu of the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Education and the Workforce now printed in the bill, an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 118-50 is considered adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment considered as adopted: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
